name: Acid
description: Does d6 damage on contact.

name: Antivenoms
description: Allows a re-roll of a failed Save vs Poison if applied immediately. Only works vs mundane poisons.

name: Binoculars
description: For looking at stuff.

name: Caltrops
description: Cover a 10 foot area. Save vs Hazards or suffer d4 damage when walking through.

name: Camera
description: For taking pictures of stuff.

name: Climbing Gear
description: Includes 50 feet of rope, 10 pitons, a grappling hook, carabiners and other accoutrements.

name: Crowbar
description: +1 vandalism to pry stuff open.

name: Explosives
description: For each unit used, +1 vandalism to blow stuff up. D10 damage to everybody in the blast (Save vs Hazards negates). One use only.

name: Fire Extinguisher
description: Puts out fires.

name: First-Aid Kit
description: Contains bandages, splints and so on to provide emergency medical treatment in the field.

name: Flashlight
description: lluminates an area.

name: Geiger Counter
description: Allows radiation levels to be detected.

name: Glue
description: Sticky stuff.

name: Handcuffs
description: For restraining people.

name: Laptop Computer
description: Does everything a computer does. Required in order to interact with computer code in the field.

name: Lighter
description: Allows fires to be lit.

name: Lockpicks
description: Required in order to pick normal locks.

name: Makeup Kit
description: +1 to rolls to disguise yourself.

name: Metal Detector
description: Goes beepwhen pointed at metal.

name: Mirror
description: Reflects things.

name: Night-vision Goggles
description: Lets you see in the dark. Bright light becomes painful.

name: Reload
description: Allows a weapon to be used after running out of ammunition. 1 use per reload taken.

name: Scuba Gear
description: Lets you breath underwater for an hour.

name: Shovel
description: Useful for digging.

name: Smartphone
description: Does everything a smartphone does.

name: Smoke Bombs
description: Fill a fifteen foot area with smoke, blocking line of sight. You get 5.

name: Special Reload
description: Allows a specialist weapon to be used after running out of ammunition. Applies only to one weapon, specify which for each special reload. One use per reload taken.

name: Sub-vocal Microphone
description: Lets you communicate with everybody else in the party with a sub-vocal microphone al-most silently and at range.
